data.title: Brand Positioning of Joyalukkas
data.meta_description: Brand Positioning of Joyalukkas - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides an overview and outline for a project report on the brand positioning strategy of Joyalukkas, an Indian jewelry brand. It begins with an acknowledgment and bona fide certificate. It then introduces the topic of brand positioning and defines it. The research problem identified is how Joyalukkas has positioned its brand in the minds of consumers compared to competitors. The objectives of the study are to assess competitor positions, identify the most recommended brand, and analyze promotional activities. The methodology will involve collecting primary data through questionnaires at Joyalukkas showrooms and analyzing the variables.
